languages.text: {n}Префект возмущенно трясет головой.{/n} "Ради спасения детей мать могла оболгать себя! И, что хуже, священную службу Администратума!"

{n}The indignant prefect shakes her head energetically.{/n} "She is a mother trying to save her children! That may have been a false confession! And, what is worse, a false accusation against the sacred service of the Administratum!"
languages.original_text: {n}Префект возмущенно трясет головой.{/n} "Ради спасения детей мать могла оболгать себя! И, что хуже, священную службу Администратума!"

{n}The indignant prefect shakes her head energetically.{/n} "She is a mother trying to save her children! That may have been a false confession! And, what is worse, a false accusation against the sacred service of the Administratum!"

{n}The indignant prefect shakes her head energetically.{/n} "She is a mother trying to save her children! That may have been a false confession! And, what is worse, a false accusation against the sacred service of the Administratum!"

languages.text: {n}Die indignierte Präfektin schüttelt energisch den Kopf.{/n} "Sie ist eine Mutter, die versucht, ihre Kinder zu retten! Das Geständnis könnte falsch gewesen sein! Noch schwerer wiegt allerdings der Vorwurf gegen den heiligen Dienst des Administratums!"
languages.original_text: {n}The indignant prefect shakes her head energetically.{/n} "She is a mother trying to save her children! That may have been a false confession! And, what is worse, a false accusation against the sacred service of the Administratum!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die indignierte Präfektin schüttelt energisch den Kopf.{/n} "Sie ist eine Mutter, die versucht, ihre Kinder zu retten! Das Geständnis könnte falsch gewesen sein! Noch schwerer wiegt allerdings der Vorwurf gegen den heiligen Dienst des Administratums!"

languages.text: {n}La préfète indignée secoue énergiquement la tête.{/n} « Nous avons affaire à une mère qui serait prête à tout pour sauver ses enfants ! Si ça se trouve, ses aveux sont totalement faux, de même que ses accusations à l'encontre des services sacrés de l'Administratum ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The indignant prefect shakes her head energetically.{/n} "She is a mother trying to save her children! That may have been a false confession! And, what is worse, a false accusation against the sacred service of the Administratum!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète indignée secoue énergiquement la tête.{/n} « Nous avons affaire à une mère qui serait prête à tout pour sauver ses enfants ! Si ça se trouve, ses aveux sont totalement faux, de même que ses accusations à l'encontre des services sacrés de l'Administratum ! »

languages.text: {n}行政官怒气冲冲地摇着头。{/n}“她身为人母，她的主张无非是为了保全她的子女！她的供词很可能是在说谎！更糟糕的是，她居然胆敢污蔑帝国内政部的神圣职责！”
languages.original_text: {n}The indignant prefect shakes her head energetically.{/n} "She is a mother trying to save her children! That may have been a false confession! And, what is worse, a false accusation against the sacred service of the Administratum!"

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官怒气冲冲地摇着头。{/n}“她身为人母，她的主张无非是为了保全她的子女！她的供词很可能是在说谎！更糟糕的是，她居然胆敢污蔑帝国内政部的神圣职责！”

languages.text: {n}La prefecta niega enérgicamente con la cabeza, indignada.{/n} «¡Es una madre intentando salvar a sus hijos! ¡Podría haber sido una confesión falsa! Y, lo que es peor, ¡una acusación falsa contra el servicio sagrado del Administratum!».
languages.original_text: {n}The indignant prefect shakes her head energetically.{/n} "She is a mother trying to save her children! That may have been a false confession! And, what is worse, a false accusation against the sacred service of the Administratum!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La prefecta niega enérgicamente con la cabeza, indignada.{/n} «¡Es una madre intentando salvar a sus hijos! ¡Podría haber sido una confesión falsa! Y, lo que es peor, ¡una acusación falsa contra el servicio sagrado del Administratum!».

languages.text: {n}憤慨した総監は力強く首を振った。{/n}「彼女は子供たちを救おうとする母親です！あれは偽りの自白かもしれません！しかも、さらに悪いことに、それは帝国行政局の聖なる奉仕に対する偽りの告発です！」
languages.original_text: {n}The indignant prefect shakes her head energetically.{/n} "She is a mother trying to save her children! That may have been a false confession! And, what is worse, a false accusation against the sacred service of the Administratum!"

traits.locale_text: {n}憤慨した総監は力強く首を振った。{/n}「彼女は子供たちを救おうとする母親です！あれは偽りの自白かもしれません！しかも、さらに悪いことに、それは帝国行政局の聖なる奉仕に対する偽りの告発です！」

languages.text: {n}Duruma içerleyen Prefekt, başını şiddetle sallıyor.{/n} "Çocuklarını korumaya çalışan bir anne söz konusu! Yalan itiraf olabilir! Daha kötüsü, Administratum'un kutlu hizmetine iftira atılıyor dahi olabilir!"
languages.original_text: {n}The indignant prefect shakes her head energetically.{/n} "She is a mother trying to save her children! That may have been a false confession! And, what is worse, a false accusation against the sacred service of the Administratum!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Duruma içerleyen Prefekt, başını şiddetle sallıyor.{/n} "Çocuklarını korumaya çalışan bir anne söz konusu! Yalan itiraf olabilir! Daha kötüsü, Administratum'un kutlu hizmetine iftira atılıyor dahi olabilir!"
